<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The lexer will continuously return the end-of-file token once the end of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LexToken may generate multiple tokens via UnLex but will always return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the first one. Place returned value at head of CurTok vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurTok.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Set whether to &quot;lex&quot; HLASM-flavour character and string literals. For now,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// setting this option to true, will disable lexing for character and string</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// literals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmlexer/#ab0444d4931bb723a724c77837cf8e7cc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmlexer/#ab0444d4931bb723a724c77837cf8e7cc">setLexHLASMStrings</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmlexer/#a3d9d6c13036cf05809fe08882c83237b">LexHLASMStrings</a> = V; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;MC&#95;MCPARSER&#95;MCASMLEXER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
